info.description: Complete API collection for Card Genius - Credit Card Recommendation Engine

request.description: Check if the API server is running and healthy
Returns all active spending categories (Travel, Shopping, Fuel, Food)

Calculates savings based on user's monthly spending and returns top recommended credit cards.

**Formula:**
save_monthly = (travel * 0.4 * TRAVEL_CONSTANT) + (shopping * 0.5 * SHOPING_CONSTANT) + (fuel * 0.6 * FUEL_CONSTANT) + (food * 0.7 * FOOD_CONSTANT)

**Note:** All fields are optional. Omit categories the user hasn't selected.
